content: Daivamaaya kartthaave! Pakal samayatthe addhvaanangallil ninnu nyangallude shareeram viramikkukayum, laukikachintakallilninnu nyangallude manassu pinvaangukayum cheythukondu ee sandhyaasamayatthu shaantamaayi thirusannidhiyil nilakond. Nithyasthuthikallum thudarchayaaya sthothrangallum ninakkarppikkuvaanum nyangallude jeevane samrakshichu nayikkunnavanum nyangallude aathmaakkallude sahaayiyum rakshithaavumaaya ninte krpaykku sthuthi paaduvaanum nyangalle yogyaraakkaname. Nyangall ninakku sthuthiyum sothravum karettunnu. Hosho...

Naathhaa! Krpayaal chevichaayi
Chen yaachana ketteedaname
Shushrooshakallum praarththhanayum
Preethiyode kaikkollllaname.

Svargatthilumingoozhiyilum
Kaikkollllaname-mrthiye vilakkiyoraharonthan
Dhoopatthinu samamaay-ee dhoopattheyumudayone.

Ningalleyennum-nibishleehaa sahadenmaare!
Orkkunnu nyangall-ningallthan praarththhana sharanam.

Eritheeppaalam- vazhivaanaarnnoru sahadere!
Praarththhippin nyangall-paapakkadalil mungaayvaan

Naathhan chonnaan-therin therin paapikalle!
Manavaallanumotth-manavara thannil kayariduvaan

Nalkuka bhaagyam-nin karunodayadivasatthil
Ninne keertthippaan-parishuddhanmaarude nirayil

Nin varavingkal-ninte valatthaayu nirtthaname
Naathhaa! Thrithvatthe ettuparanya mrthanmaare

Enrakshaadhipanaam naathhaa!
Kenivazhiyanisham-mohangallileykkayyo pokunnen
Udayon naathhaa! Ennaathmaavinu-kaaval nilkkaname
Manujasnehee!-pizhakallil ninnennaathmatthe
Kaattharulli-krpayaal rakshikka.

Ninmaanatthinu srshdichoraam-svargeeyanmaarum
Ninnude roopam nalkiya nararum ninnekkeertthippu
Paarum vaanum-kadalum ninnekkeertthikkum
Neeyallo-srashdaavaam Daivam.

Aathmachirakaal paariyananyiha-doothan gabriyel
Divyashlomo nalkichonnaan-mariyaamodevam
Naathhan ninnil udayon ninniludikkumaho
Sakala jagath-rakshakanaam Daivam.

Praayam koodiya kazhukane nirmmala--kanye! Nee pette-
Nnaamosin suthaneshaayaa nibi-yaartthaan nincharitham
Maanavanaayo-rammanuvelaam daivatthe
Prasavichu-paavanakanye! Nee.

Paanithalatthil paavanasabhaye sthhaapichon dhanyan
Aadhaaratthinu nibishleehanmaar-sahadere nirtthi
Koottichertthoru-marthyakulam raavum pakalum
Thirusabhayil-sthuthi paadeedunnu.

Sahadenmaare! Rakshakane prathi-hatharaayu mashihaathan
Nyaayaasanasavidham dhoopampol-ninamarppichore!
Bhoomiyilengum-poornnasamaadhaanam pularaan
Udayavano-darththhippin ningall.

Thommaashleehaa! Nee nanmaathrka-nokkunnorkkellaam
Daanolsukanaam satthamaneennum shreeyaarjikkendon
Raapakalulllla jaagaranam nomparththhanaye-
Nnivayaal nin-saamyam nedatte.

Daivasuthaddhvani kaavalunilkkum-sabha nee bhaagyavathi
Paathaallatthin vaathilukallkki-lloottam nin mumpil
Bhakshippaan nin-makkallkkaayu thanuvum paanam
Cheythiduvaan-ninavumavan nalki.

Mukthikkaayu nin krpayude vaathil muttunnippoll nyaan
Rakshaamaargamenikku vilakkee-dushdan thantratthaal
Paadaan vaaykkum- neengaanadikallkkum vayyaa
Snehanidhe!-kaattuka kaarunyam

Kapadathaperukidumulakiliruttil-thaathan than kathire!
Velliven mizhikallkkarulleedaname vaazhtthaan ninkrpaye
Pulari maranyu-sandhyayananyu thaapameni-
Kkillayyo-gathinin krpamaathram

Ulakulayumpadi kurishiluyarnnoru-gambheeraaraavam
Poozhiyilninnaamrthigathare villi-chezhunnelpicheedum
Avarudayon than-sutharude varavil thejassin
Vasthramudu-tthethirelkkaanetthum.

Eritheekkuzhiyil dushdanmaar
Dhanavaaneppol kezhunnu.
Neertthullllikkavar yaachippoo
Yaachana kellppaanillaarum
Shreshdham ninkrpa nallavane!
Nyangall than pizhayekkaallum
Naathhaa! Nin prathiroopatthe
Nithyaagnikkaayu vediyaruthe.

Shaantipradamaam sandhyayumiravum-thannonathidhanyan
Paniyaal ksheenichillavelkkunnon thanne nirmmicha
Thaathaneyum kurishaal rakshi-choru suthaneyum
Vimalaathmaa-vineyum-keertthippoo.

Vimalaathmaavin kinnaramathinaal daaveedennonam
Ensodarare! Kinnaramenti-sthothram paadeeduvin
Nallanirappum shaantiyume ngum nivasippaan
Praarththhippin naathhan thannodaay.

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhanakettittaathmaakkallmel krpacheyyenam.

Daivathanoojan nyaayavidhikkaayu vanneedunnu
Bheekaranaamaavidhinaayakaneyaar pedikkaa
Jvaalayathaakum vadiyaal nyaayam paalikkunnon
Theeyin naavaal neethipriyare veraakkeedum

Ponnennonam sarvvajagatthum parishodhikkum
Maalinyatthe sarvvam dahanan venneeraakkum
Sodarare! Naam puthraagamanam pedikkenam
Evanumippozhanuthaapam thaanabhayasthhaanam.

Enmaalinyam vellivaaykkaanum nrpanaam mashihaa!
Nyaayattheerppin vellayilenmel krpacheyyenam
